jobDescription: This is a hands-on, non-supervisory position in USP’s Reference Standards Laboratory. The Scientist I/II/III will contribute to the scientific expertise and work ethic of the laboratory through a broad range of technical support and knowledge. A Scientist I/ II/III have mastered many common techniques in the laboratory and are able to contribute their own observations and input to difficult projects. The incumbent will provide technical assistance to collaborative testing and the continued suitability for use program by performing analytical tests, reviewing analytical data, and preparing summary reports. The incumbent may execute 90% - 100% of their work at the bench level.Roles and Responsibilities
